name: VR Defense
description:
This game is an school project i've made. It was the first time i worked on a video-games and so, the first time i vorked on VR. 

This is an apk made for oculus quest but the original code was for windows so you may have some bugs like TP that were not in PC version. I will work on this before 2030 maybe :D 

ps: this was a 20/20 mark :o
